name: Seafood Lasagna with Shrimp
author: Karena
summary: It took a long time to perfect this recipe. I wanted this to be creamy and elegant, and it is. Try it with a fresh spinach salad.
ingredients: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Cook the lasagna noodles in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente
Saute onion in the butter or margarine
Combine the cottage cheese, cream cheese, basil, salt, pepper, egg, and sauteed onion
Combine the mushroom soup, milk, and garlic
Stir in the white wine , bay scallops, flounder fillets, and shrimp

Assemble ingredients in a greased lasagna pan as follows: a thin layer of seafood sauce, 1/5 noodles, 1/2 cheese mixture, 1/5 noodles, 1/2 seafood mixture, 1/5 noodles, 1/2 cheese mixture, 1/5 noodles, 1/2 seafood mixture, and remaining noodles
Place mozzarella cheese and Parmesan on the top
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 to 60 minutes
Remove from oven, and allow to stand for 10 minutes
